header.title: The best Fence installation company in Newark
bullets: Fast, responsive and friendly customer service from start to finish.
FREE custom fence quotes that you can create and review online!
Transparent pricing so you know exactly what you’re getting.
Quality Fence craftsmanship delivered by skilled contractors.

Yelp.description: Very helpful with putting together a quote and customizing the quote to our needs. Thank you for creating a few customized quotes for us and we sincerely appreciated the level of customer service and their price was competitive.
Yelp.name: Sergio V.
Yelp.title: We sincerely appreciated the level of customer service

Google.description: My family used Ergeon to replace our redwood fence. The entire Ergeon staff team from the gentleman who provided the quote, the scheduling and billing support Oscar & Joan and the work crew were a pleasure to work with (very professional, responsive, respectful and outstanding). The fence was completed without a hitch, including cleaning of the work site and removal of all debris as promised. I will certainly use Ergeon in the future and highly recommend them to everyone looking for a fence and driveway contractor.
Google.name: Craig C.
Google.title: The fence was completed without a hitch, including cleaning of the work site and removal of all debris as promised.

regulations.title: Permits & Regulations
regulations.description: See the undefined Permits & Regulations for undefined

faq.side-yard: 3 feet (within 4 feet setback) or  6 feet (beyond 4 feet setback) on street side yard, 6 feet + 1 foot lattice on interior side
faq.rear-max-height: 6 feet + 1 foot lattice (that can not be seen from a public street)
faq.setback: 4 feet on street side for 6 feet height fences
faq.corner-lot-rules: The height of fences and landscaping within a triangular area (40 feet measured from Property lines) at the street intersection is limited to three feet (3') measured from the lowest part of the adjacent street.(which is normally the gutter)

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
